title: What are some pieces of classical music with violin and piano? - Quora

response.answer_text: Beethoven sonatas for violin and piano Brahms sonatas for violin and piano Schubert sonatinas for violin and piano. Romanza for violin and piano by Sararasate. Charles Stanford Irish rhapsody #6 opus 191 Behzad Rhanjbaran Moto perpetuo for violin and piano Dohnanyi sonata for violin and piano opus 21 Paganini moto perpetuo for violin and piano opus 11 Sarasate “song of the nightingale” Sarasate’s “Jota de Pablo” op. 52 Paganini Cantabile and Waltz Paganini Sonata in A major /theme and variations. for violin and piano Bartok Romanian dances Schuman sonata opus 105 Schubert Fantasy in C Schubert Rondo opus 70 Schubert Serenade in A Mozart sonatas for piano and violin Charles Ives Sonata 4 John B McEwen. “Prince Charlie” a Scottish Rhapsody Ottoman Schoeck Sonata Opus 16 Corelli Sonatas opus 5 especially 6–12. Paul Muller Zurich Sonata opus 32 for violin and piano Kodaly Valsette for violin and piano. John Williams. “ Three pieces from Schindlers List” Tchaikovsky opus 42 Eduard Putz “twilight dream” George Gershwin “Short Story” Fritz Kreisler wrote and arranged many pieces for violin and piano. Frank sonata for violin and piano Prokofiev opus 94 Rodrigo Sonata pimpante Ravel Sonata Posthume

Spiegel im spiegel by Arvo Part. He’s a still living composer but it’s in a classical style. He also has one called Fratres for violin and piano. A lot of encore violin pieces are with piano accompaniment. I enjoy The devil’s Trill played by Oistrakh Danse improvisee by Joseph Achron Kol nidrei by Max Bruch Abodah by Bruch There might be a version of Chaccone by Vitali with piano accompaniment. Ruggiero Ricci plays a few of Chopins Nocturnes with piano accompaniment. Humoresque by Dvorak
